channel.title: Myth on stultus notes
channel.description: Recent content in Myth on stultus notes

item.title: Legend of Prester John
item.description: A mythical Christian priest-king whom medieval Europeans believed ruled a fabulously rich and powerful Christian kingdom somewhere ‘in the East’.

item.title: Lone Genius Myth
item.description: The false narrative that great work emerges from isolated individuals with superhuman talents.
